sources.title: Mr. District Attorney (1947) DENNIS O'KEEFEüçï MARGUERITE CHAPMAN
sources.description:
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX
Stars: Dennis O'Keefe, Marguerite Chapman, Adolphe Menjou
Director: Robert B. Sinclair

In this Noiresque Thriller, an assistant DA falls for a dame entangled with the crime boss he has under investigation! Based on the popular radio series "Mr. District Attorney," created by Phillips Lord. 

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: An assistant district attorney gets mixed-up with a woman who is working for the group that he is investigating.
metadata.Writer: Ian McLellan Hunter, Phillips Lord, Ben Markson
metadata.Actors: Dennis O'Keefe, Adolphe Menjou, Marguerite Chapman
